metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13045 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Irssi before 1.0.8, 1.1.x before 1.1.3, and 1.2.x before 1.2.1, when SASL is enabled, has a use after free when sending SASL login to the server.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13045` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

irssi - 0.8.19-1ubuntu1.9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: irssi package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.19-1ubuntu1.9').
